page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: In summer Barleylands is busy with people picking fruit, sometimes whole families go, taking with them empty ice cream cartons baskets or bowls to fill with raspberries, strawberries, loganberries, blackberries, black or red currants.I go with my parents it's good fun because I eat nearly as many as I pick, my favourite is straw_ berries. My mum freezes some, we eat some for tea and the rest is made into jam. Farmers grow fruit for the P.Y.O. market because it is a high risk/high cash crop.The advantages are that workers do not have to be paid and being on the edge of an urban area there are plenty of customers.The disadvantages are that the public eat too many and that they and their children damage the plants. If the weather is bad people do not come and the crop is spoiled.
